attributes.action: Full pardon for all men convicted for homosexual activities
attributes.additional_details: I want The UK Government to supress all past convictions of Men convicted of Homosexual activity in the past, and pardons granted to those so convicted.

rejection.details:
Please see the below petition:


Petition Title: Overturning Historic Convictions of Indecency for those Convicted of Homosexuality, pre-1967

Created by: Matthew Palmer

Closing: 30/03/2015
